html:
Oct 6 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Iliad SA, Nemetschek SE and Rolls Royce on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Grifols GRLSbn.MC: Citigroup raises to buy from neutral

* Iliad SA ILD.PA: SocGen resumes coverage with hold vs buy rating

* MTU Aero Engines AG MTXGn.DE: Bernstein raises to outperform from marketperform

* Nemetschek SE NEKG.DE: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* Rolls Royce RR.L: Bernstein raises to marketperform from underperform


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Abrdn PLC ABDN.L: HSBC cuts target price to 270p from 305p

* Adevinta ASA ADEA.OL: UBS cuts target price to NOK 150 from NOK 160

* Allfunds Group Plc ALLFG.AS: Morgan Stanley raises PT to EUR 20.3 from EUR 15

* Allfunds Group Plc ALLFG.AS: Morgan Stanley raises to overweight from equal-weight

* Amundi SA AMUN.PA: BofA Global Research cuts price objective to EUR 88 from EUR 91

* Andritz AG ANDR.VI: Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 54 from EUR 52

* Anheuser Busch Inbev SA ABI.BR: Credit Suisse cuts PT to EUR 53 from EUR 56

* Anheuser Busch Inbev SA ABI.BR: Jefferies cuts target price to EUR 73 from EUR 75

* Autogrill SpA AGL.MI: Credit Suisse reinstates coverage with neutral rating
